AddTransactionToSQL(Transaction, Account) - Method in class pure.bank.Transaction
This method is used to email the user after a transaction has been made The amount to be transacted is checked against the transaction limit as well as the daily transaction limit before it is added to the database, if it exceeds the limit an exception is thrown An email is sent to the user if a transfer is made from one account to another
